faults.title: Face control: slightly open at P6
faults.why: Start line right / weak fade under speed.
faults.fix: Lead wrist flatter P5–P7; rotate through—don’t flip.

faults.title: Pressure shift late (hanging back)
faults.why: Low point drifts back; thin/heel contact shows up.
faults.fix: Get to lead side by P5, then rotate around a posted lead leg.

drills.name: P6 Check + Turn Through
steps: Lead wrist flat; glove logo slightly down.
Turn chest to target without adding hand flip.

drills.name: Step-Through Pressure Shift
steps: Feet together, take club to P2.
Step lead foot toward target as arms reach P3–P4.
Swing through to tall, balanced finish.
